      Exclusive Mandate.Located in the iconic Mutual Heights building in the heart of Cape Town’s City Bowl, this stylishly renovated one-bedroom duplex apartment offers a unique blend of character, modern design, and income potential. Fully Airbnb-friendly and thoughtfully upgraded, it’s ideal for investors or those looking for a bold, lock-up-and-go city home.As you enter, you’re welcomed by a modern kitchen fitted with ample cupboard space, plumbing for one appliance, a built-in oven, and extractor fan. Just alongside is the newly renovated bathroom featuring a shower, bath, and toilet.A few steps up, the open-plan living area welcomes you with Moroccan-inspired flooring and lighting, creating a warm, textural ambience. Soaring double-volume ceilings and large windows flood the space with natural light. The lounge includes a custom built-in couch and an eye-catching wooden slat feature wall with a mounted TV. Just below the staircase, you’ll find a cleverly designed wine cellar, perfect for the entertainer or collector. There’s also plumbing for an additional two appliances tucked neatly alongside the steps.Upstairs, the loft-style bedroom includes generous built-in cupboards and a dedicated workspace - perfect for remote work or study. The black-accented interior throughout gives the home a sleek, contemporary feel.Additional highlights include:•	Secure parking bay in the connected Adderley building•	24-hour security and tag-controlled access•	Airbnb-friendly building•	Shared access to a well-equipped gym and poolA rare find that pairs modern convenience with architectural charm. This apartment ticks all the boxes for lifestyle, security, and long-term value.Contact us today to arrange a viewing.

Perfect for first-time homeowners looking to settle into a vibrant community or savvy investors seeking a lucrative rental opportunity, this property ticks all the boxes.Don't miss your chance to make this stunning apartment your own.       Exclusive Mandate.Experience the pinnacle of urban living in Cape Town’s most sought-after high-rise—16 On Bree. This exceptional 1-bedroom apartment is situated in the building’s prime location, offering unparalleled views of Signal Hill, Cape Town Stadium, the V&A Waterfront, and the bustling harbour. Whether you're an investor seeking a high-demand Airbnb-friendly unit or a city dweller looking for an iconic address, this apartment is an opportunity not to be missed.Step inside to an open-plan living space bathed in natural light, thanks to see-through sliding doors with windows on either end that frame the breathtaking cityscape. The contemporary kitchen is both stylish and functional, complete with plumbing for two appliances and seamlessly flowing into the lounge area. From here, step onto your private balcony and take in the panoramic views—a perfect setting for morning coffee or evening sundowners.The spacious bedroom is designed for comfort and convenience, featuring built-in cupboards, an en-suite bathroom, and a massive window that offers the same mesmerizing views as the balcony. The apartment also comes fully furnished, offering a turnkey solution for buyers looking to move in or rent out immediately.Additional perks include a secure parking bay and access to world-class amenities. Residents can enjoy the rooftop pool deck, bar, and coffee lounge on the 27th floor, complete with breathtaking 360-degree views of Cape Town. Stay active in the outdoor gym or unwind in the stylish first-floor restaurant.With its unbeatable location, modern finishes, and uninterrupted views, this apartment in 16 On Bree is a rare find. Don’t miss out—secure your piece of Cape Town’s skyline today!

      Discover luxury urban living in this beautifully renovated and stylishly furnished one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment in the iconic 16 on Bree. Boasting secure parking and breathtaking Table Mountain views, this unit stands out as one of the most desirable in the building.Unlike many others in the building, this apartment has been expertly upgraded and furnished, making it Airbnb-perfect and an exceptional investment opportunity. With high occupancy rates, this unit is a standout performer for both short and long-term rentals.16 on Bree offers world-class facilities to enhance your lifestyle. Residents can enjoy the rooftop pool and bar on the 27th floor, complete with spectacular city and ocean views. The fully-equipped gym provides a convenient space for health and wellness, while the recreational lounge offers a stylish setting for relaxation or social gatherings. The building is meticulously designed with 24-hour concierge and security services, CCTV surveillance, and biometric access, ensuring safety and peace of mind at all times.Situated within walking distance of The Waterfront and other key attractions, this apartment is perfectly located to take advantage of Cape Town’s vibrant city life. Whether you’re seeking a lock-up-and-go lifestyle, a luxury home, or a smart investment, this property delivers it all.Don’t miss out—secure your spot in one of Cape Town’s most exclusive developments today!

      Exclusive listing.Welcome to urban living at its finest in the heart of Cape Town’s vibrant CBD! This sleek and stylish 1-bedroom apartment is located in the highly sought-after 16 On Bree, renowned for its modern design, premium amenities, and Airbnb-friendly policies—perfect for investors or city dwellers alike.  Step into a contemporary layout, with the modern kitchen thoughtfully positioned to your left. Equipped with plumbing for two appliances, this kitchen is as functional as it is elegant. On the right, you’ll find the bedroom featuring ample built-in cupboard space and an en-suite bathroom that boasts a bath, shower, toilet, and basin, offering both comfort and convenience.  The living area is equipped with an air conditioner, ensuring year-round comfort, and flows seamlessly onto a sprawling 24-square-meter balcony. From here, you can take in stunning views of the cityscape and the ocean—your private retreat to relax or entertain.  This exceptional apartment includes a secure parking bay, and the building offers a host of amenities that elevate the living experience. Enjoy the rooftop pool deck, bar, and coffee lounge on the 27th floor, where you’ll be treated to breathtaking 360-degree views of Cape Town. Stay active in the outdoor gym or indulge in the restaurant conveniently located on the first floor.  Whether you're looking for a chic city pad or a prime investment, this apartment in 16 On Bree is your gateway to luxurious, modern living. Don't miss out on this rare opportunity!

    Dream Home in the Heart of Gardens – A Masterpiece of Luxury and Style
    
  
  
    
    
      Web Ref.
      RL23711
    
    
    
    
      Land size
      175.00 m²
    
    
    
    
    
    
      Monthly Bond Repayment
      
        
            
          
        R58,854.49
      
    
    
    
  
  
  
  
    
    
      Step into a sanctuary of elegance and light, nestled in the highly sought-after suburb of Gardens. This sunlit, multi-level masterpiece boasts breathtaking views of Table Mountain and the vibrant cityscape, offering a lifestyle of unparalleled sophistication.Spanning three exquisite stories, this architectural gem features four opulent bedrooms, each a private retreat with full en-suite bathrooms, fireplaces, and personal balconies. Imagine waking up to panoramic vistas, cozying up by your own fireplace on crisp mornings, or sipping coffee on your secluded terrace. With soaring ceilings throughout, the home exudes grandeur and spaciousness, creating an atmosphere of serene luxury.The moment you step into the home, you’re greeted by handcrafted original terracotta tiles, thoughtfully designed to keep cool in summer and warm in winter. This timeless feature enhances the natural harmony of the space, setting the tone for a home that lives and breathes with the seasons.The open-plan living area is a dream for entertainers, seamlessly flowing around a fully equipped, state-of-the-art kitchen and a central courtyard. Slide open the expansive glass doors, and the courtyard becomes an extension of your living space—a haven for summer soirees under the stars. On cooler nights, the intimate ambiance of the interior transforms the area into a cozy retreat, with the addition of a conservatory-style dining room bathed in soft, natural light.The courtyard is the beating heart of this home. Lush greenery, custom-designed water features, and tranquil nooks make it the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Whether hosting a lively gathering or enjoying a quiet evening, the courtyard provides a seamless indoor-outdoor experience that elevates every moment.Each bedroom offers a world of its own, spread thoughtfully across three levels for maximum privacy and comfort. The combination of high ceilings, warm finishes, and those spectacular views creates spaces that are as calming as they are inspiring. With every modern convenience included, from walk-in closets to spa-inspired bathrooms, these rooms redefine luxury living.Extra Features•	Chef’s kitchen with premium appliances, sleek cabinetry, and ample workspace.•	A conservatory dining area designed for intimate dinners or grand celebrations.•	Energy-efficient design elements to keep the home naturally temperate year-round.•	Seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces ideal for any season.This home doesn’t just offer a place to live—it offers a lifestyle. Whether you’re captivated by the awe-inspiring mountain views, enchanted by the meticulously designed interiors, or thrilled by the vibrant energy of Gardens, this property has it all.Your dream home awaits—schedule a private viewing today to experience the magic for yourself.

    Prime Investment Opportunity - 1 Bedroom Apartment in Cape Town’s City Bowl
    
  
  
    
    
      Web Ref.
      RL23257
    
    
    
    
    
      Floor size
      52.00 m²
    
    
    
    
    
      Monthly Bond Repayment
      
        
            
          
        R16,468.27
      
    
    
    
  
  
  
  
    
    
      Seize the chance to invest in a stylish, Airbnb-friendly one-bedroom apartment, ideally located in the sought-after City Bowl of Cape Town. This property is not just a home—it's a lucrative investment, perfect for short-term letting to both holidaymakers and business travelers. Whether you’re an investor looking to capitalize on Cape Town’s thriving tourism market or a young professional seeking a cosmopolitan lifestyle, this apartment ticks all the boxes.The well-appointed bedroom comes with an en suite bathroom, offering comfort and privacy for both residents and guests. A modern kitchen, complete with a built-in oven and extractor fan, caters to the needs of those who appreciate both functionality and design. The lounge area, bathed in natural light from large windows, provides a bright, welcoming space to relax or entertain.For added appeal, residents have access to premium on-site amenities, including a swimming pool and gym on the second floor—conveniences that are highly desirable for Airbnb guests. Security is a top priority, with 24-hour protection ensuring safety and peace of mind for both owners and renters.This apartment is more than just a place to live—it's a strategic investment with high potential returns. Situated in the heart of Cape Town, it offers unparalleled access to the city’s top attractions, restaurants, and shops, making it a hotspot for short-term rental demand.Don’t miss this opportunity to grow your portfolio with a property that offers both lifestyle and income potential. Contact us today to arrange a viewing and explore the possibilities.
